name: El Capitan Trueno
overview: El Capitán Trueno (Captain Thunder) is the name of a famous Spanish comic book which tells the ongoing story of the eponymous 12th-century hero. This is the first game dealing with the character, released to all of the Spanish-speaking world's most vital computing platforms at the time. This version contain two different segments, the first a calmer adventure portion followed by some frenetic arcade action.
